cytoviz.noSelectedElement: Select a node or edge to show its data

elementData.noData: No data to display for this element.

label.error: An error occured during the scenario run
label.uninitialized: The scenario has not been run yet

button.refresh: Refresh (will then be disabled for 15 seconds)

noscenario.title: No scenario yet
noscenario.label: You can create a scenario by clicking on "Create new scenario"

unknown.details: Something went wrong when fetching PowerBI reports info
unknown.label: Unknown error

no.permission: You don't have permission to view this page.

delete.description: This operation is irreversible. Dataset(s) will not be removed, but the scenario parameters will be lost. If this scenario has children, they will be moved to a new parent. The new parent will be the parent of the deleted scenario.
delete.title: Remove scenario '{{scenarioName}}'?

error.label: Error
error.forbiddenchars: Scenario name has to start with a letter, and can only contains letters, digits, spaces, underscores and hyphens.

tooltip.isvalidfile: Error: column name must be a string

parameters.title: Discard current modifications ?
parameters.body: You will lose all your current changes made on the scenario parameters.

confirmLaunchDialog.title: Launch scenario ?
confirmLaunchDialog.body: Running a scenario can take time. Any existing results for this scenario will be overwriten.

about.title: Supply Chain version 2.2.1
about.content: Cosmo Tech Supply Chain digital twin solution

time_configuration.date_boundaries_error: The simulation start date must be before the simulation end date

distribution.title: Uncertainties probability distribution law
distribution.tooltip: Select the type of probability distribution used for uncertainties

stock_dispatch.title: Intermediary stock dispatch policy
stock_dispatch.tooltip: By default, at each time step, intermediate stocks dispatch their available quantity to downstream operations. This parameter is used to add a share to this dispatch. This part corresponds to a quantity that the stock can reserve to retain it.

manage_backlog.title: Track and serve backlog orders
manage_backlog.tooltip: Activate the ability to keep in memory the quantities not served in full on time and to serve them as soon as possible

obsolete_stock.title: Automatic obsolete stock deletion
obsolete_stock.tooltip: If activated: model will automatically delete stocks during simulation when no further demand exists

batch_size.title: Batch size
batch_size.tooltip: Multiple to be observed at the end of production operation before being able to move on to the next operation (default value is 0 which means no batch size constraint) - Is applied to all production operations.

financial_cost.title: Financial cost of stock
financial_cost.tooltip: Cost of the financial asset due to inventory (ratio between 0 and 1 applied to inventory value for each time step)

stock.label: Stock policy
stock.tooltip: Will be applied to all stocks.

op_fixed.tooltip: Stock policy on order point and fixed quantity (r,q).

op_variable.tooltip: Stock policy on order point aiming at replenishing the stock up to an user-defined level (s,S).

make_to_forecast.tooltip: Stock policy aiming at replenishing the stock to have enough quantities available to serve the forecasted demand and maintaining the defined safety stock.

from_dataset.tooltip: Enables to use different stock policies (to be defined for each stock in the dataset).

sourcing.label: Sourcing policy
sourcing.tooltip:
Rule to apply in case of multi-sources to a stock.
Will be applied to all stocks.

equi.tooltip: The quantity ordered from the stock is evenly distributed among all the directly upstream production operations and transports.

highest.tooltip: Consider the directly upstream production operations and transports one by one in a determined order following their available quantities with the highest first, in the event of a tie, the choice is based on the alphabetical order of their ID. Assign the quantity to order by allocating to each one a quantity equal to the minimum between its available quantity and the remaining quantity to order. If a quantity to order remains, it is assigned following an equidistribution.

priority.tooltip: Consider the directly upstream production operations and transports one by one in a determined order following their priorities with the highest first, in the event of a tie, the choice is based on the alphabetical order of their ID. Assign the quantity to order by allocating to each one a quantity equal to the minimum between its available quantity and the remaining quantity to order. If a quantity to order remains, it is assigned to the first.

stockDispatch.label: Stock dispatch policy
stockDispatch.tooltip:
Rule to apply in case of multi-destinations from a stock.
Will be applied to all stocks.

equi.tooltip: The available quantity in the stock is evenly distributed among the directly downstream production operations and transports which received an order for the current time step and the stock itself if stock retention is allowed and the stock has a demand or a backlog for the current time step.

greatest.tooltip: Consider the directly downstream production operations and transports one by one in a determined order following their required quantities with the greatest first, in the event of a tie, the choice is based on the alphabetical order of their ID. Distribute the available quantity by allocating to each one a quantity equal to the minimum between its required quantity and the remaining available quantity.

smallest.tooltip: Consider the directly downstream production operations and transports one by one in a determined order following their required quantities with the smallest first, in the event of a tie, the choice is based on the alphabetical order of their ID. Distribute the available quantity by allocating to each one a quantity equal to the minimum between its required quantity and the remaining available quantity.

priority.tooltip: Consider the directly downstream production operations and transports one by one in a determined order following their priorities with the highest first, in the event of a tie, the choice is based on the alphabetical order of their ID. Distribute the available quantity by allocating to each one a quantity equal to the minimum between its required quantity and the remaining available quantity.

none.tooltip: The available quantity in the stock is evenly distributed among all the directly downstream production operations and transports.

production.label: Production policy
production.tooltip:
Rule to apply in case of multi-operations for a production resource.
Will be applied to all production resources.

equi.tooltip: The available time of the production resource is evenly distributed among the contained production operations which received an order for the current time step.

greatest.tooltip: Consider the contained production operations one by one in a determined order following their required times with the greatest first, in the event of a tie, the choice is based on the alphabetical order of their ID. Distribute the available time by allocating to each one a time equal to the minimum between its required time and the remaining available time.

smallest.tooltip: Consider the contained production operations one by one in a determined order following their required times with the smallest first, in the event of a tie, the choice is based on the alphabetical order of their ID. Distribute the available time by allocating to each one a time equal to the minimum between its required time and the remaining available time.

priority.tooltip: Consider the contained production operations one by one in a determined order following their priorities with the highest first, in the event of a tie, the choice is based on the alphabetical order of their ID. Distribute the available time by allocating to each one a time equal to the minimum between its required time and the remaining available time.

tabs.placeholder: These parameters are confidential and you don't have permission to get access to them. If you think this is a mistake, please contact your application administrator.

tooltip.disabled: Please save or discard current modifications before selecting another scenario
